Argentina 1990 World Cup final Argentina 1990 FIFA World Cup performance
The legendary Argentina No10 delivered a memorable performance in the last FIFA World Cup meeting between the two South American giants.
Argentina 1990 World Cup final Argentina 1990 FIFA World Cup performance

They scored only five goals in the entire tournament (a record low for a finalist). Argentina also became the first team to advance twice on penalty shoot-outs and the first team to fail to score and have a player sent off in a World Cup final.
